body.p:
INDIANA STATE SEAL.
STATE OF INDIANA
Executive Department.
Indianapolis, July 23 1863
Gov. Robinson
Frankfort Ky,
Sir

I take great pleasure in recommending to your favorable consideration, Mr. Jno. W. Ray, of Jeffersonville in this State, who desires the appointment of Commissioner of Deeds, for this State, Mr. Ray is a gentleman of high character, a prominent citizen of this State, and a personal friend of mine. Any favor shown him will be highly appreciated.

I have the honor to be
Very Respectfully
Yr. Obt Sevat
O. P. Morton
Gov. of Indiana

Indiana
Comr of Deeds
Jno. W. Ray
Indianapolis
Com Issd July 25. 1863.
